entry.title: Friday: Flurries. High minus 17.
entry.summary: A few flurries ending this afternoon then mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Wind north 30 km/h gusting to 50. High minus 17. Wind chill minus 34 this morning and minus 29 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:30 AM CST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 22. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries this evening. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 22. Wind chill minus 30 this evening and minus 35 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:30 AM CST Friday 23 December 2022
